nodes.text: Spacecap Droids were droids used to handle baggage. Multiple were employed at the Star Tours travel agency's Tomorrowland Starport, where they were tasked with loading checked luggage onto the hangar's baggage conveyor. By the year 4.3 ABY, F-25-OJSx, an F series repair droid, worked as a Spacecap Droid at Tomorrowland Starport.
